item.title: Is Al Qaeda Impotent?
item.description: Captain Ed raises an interesting point in response to al Qaeda’s declaration of war on North Africa Despite their general inability to prevail in Iraq, successfully detonate explosives in Britain, and do anything else in the US, AQ warned Muslims to stay away from their own government buildings on the south side of the Mediterranean He writes a good piece–which reminded me of this humor entry I posted in 2003 and agian in 2005:
